title: idayak-kOvilil
sahitya:
idayak-kOvilil iruppavaL nIyE InreDutta tAyE shankari mAyE


anupallavi

  edaiyum un seyalena eNNiDum enakku udaviDum karuNai uLLamillaiyO unakku


caraNam    vidavidamAi innal viLaindiTTa pOdum unai vaNangum eNNam manak-kaDalil mOdum
hitam purindAlum nI vadam purindAlum padamalar maravEn pEdai ennALum
